details.topic: The Perl Debugger for Power Users

synopsis.p: A talk about the Perl debugger sandwiched between a couple of short presentations.

talk.speaker: Stuart Watt
talk.title: The Perl Debugger for Power Users

description.p: Tricks for power users who want to get the most out of Perl's debugger. This might touch on performance exploration using Devel::NYTProf.
Other interesting modules mentioned included: Devel::Leak, Devel::Size, Devel::Cycle, Smart::Comments.
What happened at the Pittsburgh Perl Workshop 2010.
